comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model ConcourseFacility adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/ConcourseFacility/schema.json
description: Property. Information about an Airport Concourse as buildings or infrastructure used to provide services.

contents.name: TerminalFacility
contents.comment: Information about an Airport Terminal as buildings or infrastructure used to provide services.
